programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes are tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Paz seeks allies in the pursuit of justice–or vengeance. She forms an alliance with Warner.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Tommy is on a path to avenge LaKeisha’s murder. Elisa Marie investigates what’s on the USB stick.

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: A rescue plan threatens to divide Flint and Silver. Max learns the price of freedom. Rackham seeks his prey.

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: Silver and his men hunt for Flint on Skeleton Island. Madi is made an offer. Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor.

programme.title: Trauma Center
programme.desc: A detective teams up with an injured female witness to avenge the murders of his partner and an informant.

programme.title: Survive the Game
programme.desc: Two cops join forces with a troubled vet when a drug-dealing gang takes over the man’s farm as a hideout.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Rogue
programme.desc: Chasing bandits from L.A. to New York, Knight crashes into his dark past, imperiling his case…and his life.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Redemption
programme.desc: Knight deals out both mercy and justice – on his terms – when the city is terrorized by The Christmas Bomber.

programme.title: Detective Knight: Independence
programme.desc: A vigilante hits close to Knight’s home when he threatens to blow up the city’s Fourth of July festivities.
